actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: Making technical amendments in the Rules of the House, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require each House committee to publish its rules in the Congressional Record not later than 30 days after the committee is elected (currently, not later than 30 days after the Congress convenes). Removes certain restrictions on the three-day layover for committee reports. Provides that the prohibition against professional committee staff engaging in any work other than committee business applies to such staff's congressional working hours. Amends rule XXI to specify the authority of the Committee on the Budget to report reconciliation bills. Amends rule XXIV to specify that the call of committees on Calendar Wednesday begins again in a new Congress. Amends rule XLI to make the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct responsible for administering such rule, which concerns the qualifications of officers and employees of the House. (Currently, the Committee on House Administration has such responsibility.) Repeals certain rules provisions relating to unofficial office accounts, the franking privilege, the earned income limitation, and the Intelligence Committee.

titles.title: Making technical amendments in the Rules of the House, and for other purposes.
